text: Ahmed Abdel Hadi ChalabiSometimes transcribed as Ahmad al-Jalabi. (; 30 October 1944 â€“ 3 November 2015) was an Iraqi politician. He was interim Minister of Oil in Iraq serving from 16 April 2005 to 1 January 2006. He served as Deputy Prime Minister from 1 May 2005 to 20 May 2006. Chalabi failed to win a seat in parliament in the December 2005 elections. Chalabi died on 3 November 2015 from a heart attack at his home in Kadhimiya, Baghdad, aged 71. ==Related pages== *List of scientists from Asia ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Iraqi politicians Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology alumni Category:University of Chicago alumni
title: Ahmed Chalabi
